title: Game Wont Load After Champ Select
body:
After the latest Patch the game doesn't load after Champ select, the screen minimises like normal to begin loading in but then reopens and just shows the reconnect button which when I press just repeats the previous process leaving me stuck until the game ends, unable to connect.

Tried looking up old fixes and reinstalling, running hextech repair tool, restarting. Nothing works. Tried a Ranked Game and then a normal game, getting leave buster and losing points. Now been trying with custom games, Nothing seems to work.

Linked the file that Hextech Repair leaves after you use it.

replies.body: Likely related to content described in [this](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/sB4ucqXc-game-client-anti-cheat-changes-going-live) thread.  I recommend reading through that and posting there if you still have issues.
He is not alone, I got the same issue as he got: game won't start after champ select, but it doesnt't show im dc. Already use the Hextech tool but still not work.
